mapper.sql: t_project.project_id , project_name, project_content, project_state, user_id, project_total
mapper.insert: insert into t_project (project_name, project_content, project_state, user_id) values (#{projectName},#{projectContent},#{projectState},#{userId})
mapper.select: select ,sum_amount.total_amount from ( select project_id, sum(amount) total_amount from t_finance group by project_id ) as sum_amount right join t_project on t_project.project_id = sum_amount.project_id

select t_project.project_id, t_project.project_name, t_project.project_content, t_project.project_state, t_project.user_id, t_project.project_total from t_project join t_project_attendance on t_project.project_id = t_project_attendance.project_id where t_project_attendance.user_id = #{Id}
SELECT tu.user_id, tu.user_name FROM t_user tu LEFT JOIN t_project_attendance tpa ON tu.user_id = tpa.user_id WHERE project_id = #{projectId} AND tu.user_authority = #{authority}

select project_id, project_name, project_content, project_state, user_id,project_total from t_project
and project_name like concat('%',#{Project.projectName},'%')
and project_content like concat('%',#{Project.projectContent},'%')
and project_state = #{Project.projectState}
